pages.cookies: Cookies Policy - Golden Sands Casino 18+ Casino Gallery Contact us Cookie Usage Disclaimer Information About Cookies: This website may use cookies to enhance user experience and offer personalized services. Cookies are small text files stored on your device by your web browser. They help us analyze website traffic, customize content, and improve our services. By accessing this site, you agree to the use of cookies in line with our Cookie Policy. Types of Cookies: We may use different types of cookies, including session cookies, which are temporary and deleted when you close your browser, and persistent cookies, which remain on your device for a specified period. These cookies may be set by us or by third-party services we use. Third-Party Cookies: This website may include links to third-party websites or services that may employ their own cookies. We have no control over the content or policies of these external websites. Please review their respective privacy policies for more information on their cookie usage. Cookie Management: You have the option to manage or disable cookies through your browser settings. You can typically find these settings in the "Options" or "Preferences" menu of your browser. Please be aware that disabling cookies may impact the functionality of this website and your user experience. Cookie Policy Updates: We reserve the right to update our Cookie Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or applicable laws. Any revisions will be published on this page, and we encourage you to review this policy regularly for updates. Analytics Cookies: We may use analytics cookies to gather information about how visitors interact with our website. This data helps us analyze website traffic and improve our services. Analytics cookies collect information in an anonymous form and do not personally identify you. Advertising Cookies: We may work with advertising partners to display relevant ads based on your interests. Advertising cookies track your browsing habits and preferences to deliver targeted advertisements. You can opt out of targeted advertising by adjusting your browser settings or visiting the opt-out pages of our advertising partners. Cookie Consent: By using this website, you consent to the use of cookies as described in our Cookie Policy. If you do not consent to the use of cookies, please refrain from using this website or disable cookies in your browser settings. Contact Us: If you have any questions or concerns about our Cookie Policy or the use of cookies on this website, please contact us for assistance. Our team is here to provide you with more information and address any inquiries you may have. Golden Sands Casino offers a luxurious and exhilarating gaming experience. Located in the heart of the city, we provide top-notch entertainment, exclusive games, and gourmet dining. Join us for an unforgettable adventure. pages.privacyPolicy: Privacy Policy - Golden Sands Casino 18+ Casino Gallery Contact us Golden Sands Casino Information Collection Practices Information Collection In our commitment to delivering exceptional service and experiences, Golden Sands Casino collects various types of information, including: Personal Identification Information: This includes details such as your name, email address, and contact number, provided during registration or inquiries. Website Usage Data: We track information about your interactions with our website, including visit frequencies and navigation patterns. Transaction Histories: We maintain records of your interactions and transactions with our services, including purchases and payment method specifics. Location Data: We may collect your geographical location to provide localized services or personalize your experience. Utilization of Collected Data The information we gather is utilized in several key ways: To personalize your browsing experience according to your preferences. To enhance the overall quality and functionality of the services offered on our website. To efficiently manage transactions and accurately process your orders. To engage with you regarding upcoming promotional events, special offers, and updates about our unique offerings. To improve our services and develop new features based on user feedback and trends analysis. Information Distribution Policies We are committed to protecting your privacy and oppose the sale, trade, or unauthorized distribution of your personally identifiable information to third parties, with limited exceptions: When legal obligations mandate such disclosure. To protect our rights or properties. To uphold the terms and policies of our website. To our trusted partners and service providers who assist in our business operations, provided they agree to uphold the confidentiality of this information and utilize it solely for intended purposes. Safeguarding Your Personal Data We employ a range of security measures to safeguard your personal information. However, it's important to note that no internet-based transmission or storage method is entirely infallible. Cookie Usage Our website utilizes cookies to enhance your browsing experience. You have the option to adjust your browser settings to reject cookies or to receive notifications when cookies are being sent. Policy Amendments Golden Sands Casino reserves the right to amend this privacy policy as necessary. Any revisions will be prominently displayed on our website. Consent By using Golden Sands Casino, you consent to the collection and use of your information as outlined in this privacy policy. Retention of Data We will retain your personal data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this privacy policy.
